title: India's millennials get a taste for ayurveda
author: NEETA LAL
description: Traditional wellness system redefined in home market as consumer health concerns mount
cleaned_text: NEW DELHI -- Himalayan herb-infused energy drinks, ayurvedic shakes and powders, herbal juices and gummies, immunity boosters and more such products are jostling for buyers' attention in Indian shops as COVID-19 ravages the country.
